commands.whoami: Sends back information about who you are.
commands.whois: [user] Sends back information about the user specified.
commands.discord: Allows linking of your discord account to your BAR account.
commands.mute: [username] Mutes that user and prevents you seeing their messages.
commands.unmute: [username] Un-mutes that user and allows you to see their messages.
commands.coc: [term] Searches the code of conduct and returns items with a textual match in them.
commands.joinq: Adds you to the queue to join when a space opens up, you will be automatically added to the game as a player. If already a member it has no effect.
commands.leaveq: Removes you from the join queue.
commands.status: Status info about the battle lobby.
commands.splitlobby: [minimum players] Causes a vote to start where other players can elect to join you in splitting the lobby, follow someone of their choosing or remain in place. After 30 seconds, if at least the minimum number of players agreed to split, you are moved to a new (empty) lobby and those that voted yes or are following someone that voted yes are also moved to that lobby.
commands.roll:
[range] Rolls a random number based on the range format.
- Dice format: nDs, where n is number of dice and s is sides of die. E.g. 4D6 - 4 dice with 6 sides are rolled
- Max format: N, where N is a number and an integer between 1 and N is returned
- Min/Max format: MN MX, where each is a number and an integer between them (inclusive) is returned
commands.explain: Lists a log of the steps taken to calculate balance for the lobby
commands.reset-approval: Resets the list of approved players to just the ones present at the moment (approved players are able to join even if it is locked and without needing a password). Requires boss privileges.
commands.meme: [meme] A predefined bunch of settings for meme games. It's all Rikerss' fault. Requires boss privileges. ticks: Ticks only!, nodefence: No defences, greenfields: No metal extractors, rich: Infinite money, poor: No money generation, hardt1: T1 but no seaplanes or hovers either, crazy: Random combination of several settings, undo: Removes all meme effects
commands.welcome-message: [message] Sets the welcome message sent to anybody joining the lobby. Run this command without a message to clear the existing message. Requires boss privileges. Use $$ to add a line return.
commands.gatekeeper: [(default | friends | friendsplay | clan)] sets the gatekeeper for this battle. Requires boss privileges. > default: no limitations. > friends allows only friends of existing members to join the lobby. > friendsplay: allows only friends of existing players to become players (but anybody can join to spectate)
commands.rename: [new name] Renames the lobby to the name given. Requires boss privileges.
commands.resetratinglevels: Resets the rating level limits to not exist. Player limiting commands are designed to be used with $rename, please be careful not to abuse them. Requires boss privileges.
commands.minratinglevel: [min-level] Sets the minimum level for players, you must be at least this rating to be a player. Requires boss privileges.
commands.maxratinglevel: [max-level] Sets the maximum level for players, you must be at below this rating to be a player. Requires boss privileges.
commands.setratinglevels: [min-level] [max-level] Sets the minimum and maximum rating levels for players. Requires boss privileges.

overview.newLobbySubtext:
Welcome to the new BAR lobby public testing alpha 1 commander !
This version only supports singleplayer game modes.

scenarios.title: Scenarios
scenarios.description: Test your skills in this set of challenging yet rewarding missions.

serverSettings.info: Changing the Active Server has immediate effect. Remember to log in after switching.

settings.title: settings
settings.logUrlCopied: Log URL was copied to clipboard.

errors.incomingCapacityReached: User has too many incoming requests
errors.unauthorized: Not authorized to send friend requests
errors.commandUnimplemented: Friend requests not supported on this server
errors.outgoingRequestExists: Friend request already sent to this user
errors.incomingRequestExists: This user has already sent you a friend request

chat.typeHerePlaceholder: Type here to chat. Use '/' for commands.

syncDataDirsDialog.title: Sync Data Directories
syncDataDirsDialog.description: This tool let's you synchronise multiple data directories if you use multiple lobby applications. Select the data directory for the other lobby application below, then check the content you wish to synchronise. Files not from this lobby's data dir will be kept, and folders will be merged.

error.fatalErrorDescription: A fatal error has occurred and BAR Lobby needs to reload.
error.logUrlCopied: Log URL was copied to clipboard.

hostBattle.title: Host Battle
hostBattle.settingUp: Setting up a dedicated battle host, this usually takes around 30 seconds
